metadata.title: CVE-2020-36308 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Redmine before 4.0.7 and 4.1.x before 4.1.1 allows attackers to discoverthe subject of a non-visible issue by performing a CSV export and readingtime entries.

criterions.comment: redmine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
